description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission reference 204655FUL dated 09.02.2021 for "Construction of a 3 storey building comprising a nursery (Class E(f)) with associated cycle parking, landscaping, refuse storage and associated works". Amendments seeks to make alterations to the drawings including alterations relating to brickwork detailing, decrease in the size of windows and doors on front elevation, increase in internal floor-to-ceiling height at ground and first floor, and decrease in the second floor floor-to-ceiling height and increase in parapet height.
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s): 3206-CB-A-DR-10-61 Rev. A; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-62 Rev. A; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-63 Rev. A; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-64 Rev. A; 3206-CB-A-DR-10-65 Rev. A.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
